Articles.Content: Hello everyone. Been playing and lurking on forums for few months. Just started posting. Am very happy with the developers and the great community. KSP is one of the greatest games that is also educational and addictive.

Hello one. Been playing and lurking on forums for few years. Posted way too much. Am very happy with the developers and the great community. KSP is one of the greatest games that is also educational and addictive.

Hello electron2059 and welcome to the forums!

I think we all agree that KSP is one of the greatest games.  Glad to have you aboard.

Happy landings!
